name: rainaissance

description: Control rain and snow and background sounds on your Mac with Rainaissance through Raycast.
author: freepicheep

commands.name: change-rain-sound
commands.title: Change Rain Sound
commands.description: Change the rain sound of Rainaissance.

commands.name: toggle-rain-sounds
commands.title: Toggle Rain Sounds
commands.description: Toggle the rain sound of Rainaissance.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
